sentences.en: alternate blue and red stripes
sentences.cn: 蓝红相间的条纹

sentences.en: Alternate cubes of meat and slices of red pepper.
sentences.cn: 交替放置肉丁和红辣椒片。

sentences.en: alternate layers of fruit and cream
sentences.cn: 水果层和奶油层相间

sentences.en: An alternate name for a member of a partitioned data set.
sentences.cn: 一分区数据集中某成员的替换名.

sentences.en: Arrange the leeks and noodles in alternate layers .
sentences.cn: 一层韭葱、一层面条地交替放置。

sentences.en: Convolutions frequently alternate in direction of rotation and vary in pitch.
sentences.cn: 盘旋经常改变回转方向和节距.

sentences.en: Day and night alternate.
sentences.cn: 昼夜更替.

sentences.en: Farmers usually alternate their crops.
sentences.cn: 农民通常实行轮种.

sentences.en: He and I clean our room on alternate days.
sentences.cn: 我和他隔日轮流打扫我们的房间.

sentences.en: Her aggressive moods alternated with gentle or more cooperative states.
sentences.cn: 她的挑衅情绪与温和或更为合作的情绪互相交替。

sentences.en: In most jurisdictions, twelve jurors and two alternates are chosen.
sentences.cn: 在大多数审判中，12名陪审员和2名替补人员会被选出。

sentences.en: Lesley had agreed to Jim going skiing in alternate years.
sentences.cn: 莱斯莉已同意吉姆每隔一年去滑一次雪。

sentences.en: My sister and I alternate in washing the supper dishes.
sentences.cn: 我姐姐和我轮流洗晚餐的碗碟.

sentences.en: Nancy and her sister will alternate in satting the table.
sentences.cn: 南茜和她姊姊轮流布置餐桌.

sentences.en: Now you just alternate layers of that mixture and eggplant.
sentences.cn: 现在你只需把茄子和拌料一层层交替放好。

sentences.en: That was a week of alternate rain and sunshine.
sentences.cn: 那是晴雨天交替的一周.

sentences.en: The amount of time needed for these tasks will vary and perhaps it would be better to alternate them each weekend to lessen the workload.
sentences.cn: 所有这些工作所耗费的时间是无法确定的，或许在每个周末交替着选用其中几个方法会减少工作量。

sentences.en: the appointment of an alternate director
sentences.cn: 一位候补董事的任命

sentences.en: The three acts will alternate as headliners throughout the tour.
sentences.cn: 这3个节目将在整个巡回演出中轮流打头牌。

sentences.en: The two patterns alternate over periods of two to seven years in the tropical Pacific.
sentences.cn: 在热带的太平洋地区，这两种现象的交替周期超过了两到七年。

sentences.en: They were streaked with alternate bands of colour.
sentences.cn: 它们都带有各种色彩相间的条纹。

sentences.en: To make the tiger blink, you alternate the transparency between the two areas by locating both the areas and paths in the corresponding XML.
sentences.cn: 要让老虎眨眼，可以通过在相应的 XML 中定位这两个区域及其路径来在两个区域间交替透明性。

sentences.en: We must alternate work with rest.
sentences.cn: 我们要劳逸结合.

sentences.en: Wet days alternate with fine days.
sentences.cn: 雨天和晴天相间而来.

words.tran_cn: 供选择的；选择性的；交替的
交替地；轮流地；隔一个地
二中择一；供替代的选择

phrases.tran_cn: 在两种状态中交替变化；时而…时而…

trans.tran_en: two alternate things are placed one after the other in a regular pattern
An alternate is a person or thing that replaces another, and can act or be used instead of them
if two things alternate, or if you alternate them, they happen one after the other in a repeated pattern
if two things alternate, or if you alternate them, they happen one after the other in a repeated pattern
